sentences.text: @ Your adventure starts here, be brave and fight to save Rafiq Stoicadius.
@ ... Finally, you're able to prove everyone you have what it takes to be a true noble.
@ You're walking alone in a nearby bar, to ask some people for some help.
@ (and to get wasted)
@ Entering, a man catches your attention...
<???> Abort you buffoon!
<???> Mercy me, I'm working with complete imbeciles.
@ Being intrigued trying to realize who he's talking to,
@ you accidentally bumped into him.
<???> Ahh! Bloody hell, watch your step young man.
<X> I'm sorry, who are you?
<???> Oh, good geavens above!
<???> Y-you don't know who I am?!?
<???> Then allow me to enlighten you, poor soul...
<M> I am Maxerius Infinitus...
<M> A gentleman of the highest order!
<M> Remember me, as encountering one of such elevated standing is a rare privilage I say.
<X> I am "so honoured" to meet you, sir.
<X> My name's Marcellus Andronie, here to save Rafiq Soicadius.
<M> You? To save king Rafaello?? Don't make me laugh too hard,
<M> I don't like flattery.
<X> I'm serious.
<X> I am trying to prove that I'm worthy enough,
<X> to be noble.
<M> Pfft, what a child's story
<M> You think you can just stroll into the palace willy-nilly and save the king?
<M> It takes finesse, intellect, and a sexy body like mine.
<M> Stuff you clearly lack, monkey.
<M> Nevertheless, I am in need of some publicity.
<M> Maybe I, Maxerius Infinitus, could be the one who saves Rafiq..
<X> What?? You're stealing my idea?
<M> Yore idea? Yore idea was unaccomplishable.
<M> My idea is one that actually deserves merit.
<X> Not cool dude.
<X> Not cool...
<M> Don't start crying, little girl.
<M> Let's go together in this marvelous adventure. :3
@ Could this be, Maxerius being nice?
<X> Y-you really mean that? :>
<M> NO??? LOL XD
<X> Can I come with you...?
<M> Come with me? Yore idea was laughable, but let's not dwell on that.
<M> Fine, you can tag along, but don't slow me down.
<X> Really? Thanks, Maxerius!
<X> I won't let you down!
<M> Don't get too excited, we're not on a picnic.
<M> This adventure requires competence, something I doubt you possess...
@ Could this be, Maxerius being somewhat considerate?
<X> I'll do my best to prove myself!
<M> Yore 'best' may not be enough, but we shall see.
<X> Watch where *you* step, sir!
<X> Do you often collide with people in such fashion?
<???> Collide? COLLIDE?!?
<M> I, Maxerius Infinitus, do not "collide" with anyone.
<M> Now, run along before you tarnish the air with yore pedestrian presence.
@ You and Maxerius leave the bar.
<M> Say, if I bring you to someone special, you won't tell anyone?
<X> Huh? Yeah, I promise.
@ Maxerius brings you to the town square,
@ here you meet with one of his people.
<M> Sellington Shakespear! Haven't seen you on for some time..
<S> Maxerius? Thou dost have the gall to show thy face here again.
<S> Who is that creature thou brought here?
<M> Sellington, this is my new maid, Marcellus Andronie.
<X> Maid?!?
<S> A new maid thou sayest? Wish I might procure such a servant in these times.
<S> What purpose dost thou bring this fellow here for, and how may I assist thee?
<X> I never agreed to this Maxerius.
<M> You can give us some last known whereabouts of the king.
<M> You are the keeper of the king's guards after all.
<S> I see. Thou understandest any whereabouts I give can get me executed?
<M> Sellington, come on. Would I really do this to a friend I've had for 20 years?
<S> Last time I saw thee, thou left me to die in the forest nearby...
<S> So much for thy plan to capture the bears' berries.
<M> o_O
<X> Let me talk, Maxerius, "Selly," please help me.
<X> I really need to help the king.
<S> Well, so m2ch 5(r 3he br21k@n he324t I h1ve.
<S> I can help thee if 4hou b51ng 2e my st4sh
@ Shellington appears to be having a stroke
<S> Last time I saw the king, he was in his bathtub, drinking wine.
<S> I'm sorry, there's no information I can give thee, as I simply don't know.
<X> Wine in a bathtub? Living large in the castle.
<X> Picture this: a royal bath, a fine bottle, maybe a royal rubber duck.
<X> Splashing spirits? Could lead to a nearby storage room.
<X> I'm sure he's in one...
<M> Marcellus? That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.
<X> Let's go and find the storage room!
<X> Sellington, do you want to come with us?
<S> I'm afraid I can't, for I have plans to DESTROY Maxerius.
<M> Hmph.
<X> Oh well, good luck with your plan, maybe when Maxerius and I finish,
<X> I can help you with it!
<S> Wonderful...
@ You and Maxerius enter the Rafiq's castle, and enter his royal bathroom,
@ hoping you would find some good clues.
<M> There seems to be nothing but bathwater here.
<X> I'm sure there's something which can help us.
<M> Help us my arse, everything here smells like wine...
<M> I'm really in the mood for some wine.
<X> Maybe we can take a break and drink some of the king's.
@ Both of you search for the storage room inside Rafiq's castle.
@ The smell of expensive wine sure does make it easy ;)
<X> There it is!
<Q> Halt, you will not be passing me to get to the wine.
<M> AHHH! You, sir, are a complete nuisance to my operation.
<Q> I am no nuisance, I am the protector of the storage room.
<Q> I am Liviu Andrei Racovita, Esquire...
<Q> But you can call me IDETESTROSE.
<X> Ide-what?
<M> I don't have time for this nonsense. Marcellus, you're a pretty funny peasant.
<M> I'm sure you have a peculiar joke to tell this man.
<X> Uhhh...
<X> Why did the wine bottle go to therapy..?
<X> Because it had too many issues?
@ IDETESTROSE looked dead straight into Marcellus' eyes.
@ The silence was deafening.
<Q> HAHAHAHAHAHAHAQHUWUHOERGIORWJGOWEIJFWEI!!1!
@ It appears IDETESTROSE was laughing too much.
<Q> BahahaHAHahHAh!!
@ IDETESTROSE died from suffocating.
@ You have entered the storage room...
@ Something doesn't feel quite right...
@ You see a figure in the shadows, resembling a man...
@ Could this be..? Rafiq was here..??
@ He appeared to be held hostage, barely able to move..
@ As you approach him, you begin to see his face...
@ It was Rafiq...
<X> Rafiq!! My king!!
@ You could see his beautiful face once more...
@ You could kiss it right now...
@ But you see something in his eyes...
@ His eyes depict... Terror...
@ And in his pupils, you can see the reflection...
@ Maxerius Infinius
<X> This... Can't... Be...
<M> Can't be what... Marcellus?
<X> You did this??
<M> I did what I had to.
<M> As my hero once said...
<M> "Life on a fast track changes you..." - Middle-Aged Lightning Mcqueen.
<M> Now look at me, Marcellus...
<M> Own...
<M> You...
<M> Now...
@ You look at king Rafaello in fear.
To be continued :3
